item.title: Adminer — a simple GUI client for any DB
item.description: In my search for a good database GUI client for PostgreSQL, I came across a light-weight and elegant GUI client called Adminer. Adminer is a is a full-featured database management tool built with PHP. Before Adminer, I used pgAdmin III. I hoped it’d be similar to PHPMyAdmin but it wasn’t nearly as good in terms of the user interface and functionality. I found it difficult to navigate and had to write queries to perform even basic tasks.
